meanings.definition: Endure or continue for a specified period of time.
meanings.sent1: My favorite movie lasts for two hours.
meanings.sent2: The battery in my toy car lasts a long time.
meanings.sent3: I hope the magic spell lasts until I finish my homework.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lasts in my memory like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers lasts in the air after the rain.

meanings.definition: The final item in a series.
meanings.sent1: The last piece of the puzzle fits perfectly.
meanings.sent2: He always eats the last cookie in the jar.
meanings.sent3: Finding the last sock in the laundry is like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The last chapter of the book reveals a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The last drop of water in the glass sparkles in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The lowest part of a shoe or boot.
meanings.sent1: The shoelaces are tied around the lasts of the shoe.
meanings.sent2: She felt a pebble inside her boot near the lasts.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to play with the lasts of my sneakers.
meanings.sent4: The lasts of his boots left imprints in the mud.
meanings.sent5: The lasts of the high heels clicked on the marble floor.
